title: Monday Night Sci-Fi/Comedy Short: "Cropped" | Opinion - Liberal
text:
(Before It's News)
Vimeo A short comedy/sci-fi film we made for this year’s Homespun Yarns showcase. We hope you enjoy it! Cropped is about a group of UFO enthusiasts who clash with their cynical crop circle tour guide. When night falls the group have to set their differences aside when the mystery of the …
